QuestData.Title: A Rogue's End
QuestData.Description:
Shuja mentioned a rogue from the first expedition. Goes by Drizza Sidestabber.
Drizza was last seen heading northwest... towards a large bear's den.
None of us can sneak around like you. See if you can find Drizza and bring her back here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Stealth to sneak around and find the first expedition's rogue.
